org.jetel.util

Class CTLTransformUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.CTLTransformUtils

  • public class CTLTransformUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The class has the only public method findUsedInputFields that is used to find all fields used on a right side of assignment in a given CTL transformation. Limitations: - Only a list of fields is returned - if a field is shared by two metadata it is not clear from which metadata the field comes from - this utility works only for really very simple transformations, actually it works only for transformation created by drag and drop events in transform dialog

      • filterFields

        public static void filterFields(java.lang.Iterable<CTLTransformUtils.Field> fields,
                boolean output)
        Filters the collection, preserving only output fields (if output == true) or input fields (if output == false).
        Parameters:
        fields - - collection of fields
        output - - true if output fields should be preserved, false if input fields should be preserved
